name: Go Game - Joseki
description: Go Game - Joseki is the top app to improve you go game skill. it focus on the practice of Joseki.  you can practice Joseki by two way. one is play with computer for Joseki. Computer can random select the next move and you can move the next correct position. Another way is that you can study Joseki by yourself. The App can help you to understand why the move is good or not good. Above all, you can enjoy practice using the App.
